Package org.jetel.component.aggregate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregateFunction
    Function that can be used in aggregation.
    AggregateFunctionOld
    Represent aggregate function of agregate component.
    AggregateIntegerNumeric
    Integer Numeric based on IntegerDataField with additional check for arithmetic overflow in AggregateIntegerNumeric.add(Numeric) operation.
    AggregateLongNumeric
    Long integer Numeric based on LongDataField with additional check for arithmetic overflow in AggregateLongNumeric.add(Numeric) operation.
    AggregateMappingParser
    Parses the aggregation mapping.
    AggregateMappingParser.ConstantMapping
    Mapping of a constant.
    AggregateMappingParser.FieldMapping
    Mapping of a field.
    AggregateMappingParser.FunctionMapping
    Mapping of an aggregation function.
    AggregateNumericFactory
    Factory for creation of Numeric instances based on specified data field type, which are suitable for computations of aggregate functions.
    AggregateProcessor
    Applies aggregate functions on records.
    Avg
    Calculates the average value of fields.
    Count
    Calculates the count of members of an aggregate group.
    CountNonNull
    Calculates the count of members of an aggregate group wiuth a non-null value of a field.
    CountUnique
    Calculates the count of members of an aggregate group with a unique value of a field.
    CRC32
    Calculates CRC32 on an aggregation group.
    First
    Aggregate function that finds the first element, which can be null.
    FirstNonNull
    Aggregate funtion that finds the first element which is non-null.
    FunctionRegistry
    Registry of aggregation functions.
    Last
    Aggregate function thath finds the last element, which can be null.
    LastNonNull
    Aggregate funtion that finds the last element which is non-null.
    Max
    Calculates the maximum value of a field.
    MD5
    Calculates MD5 on the aggregation group.
    MD5Sum
    Aggregate function returning MD5 hash as hexadecimal string
    Median
    Finds the median.
    MessageDigestFunction
    Calculates message digest hash from binary representation of the data.
    Min
    Calculates the minimum value of a field.
    Modus
    Finds the most most frequently occurring value.
    SHA1Sum  
    SHA256Sum  
    StdDev
    Calculates the standard deviation of an aggregation group.
    Sum
    Calculates the sum of field values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AggregationException
    Indicates error in aggregator initialization.
